<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82318</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82318</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mellifont Abbey -- Monastic Life in Ireland</string>
            <string language="es">Abadía Mellifont – Vida monástica en Irlanda</string>
            <string language="ga">An Mhainistir Mhór – Saol Mainistreach in Éirinn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mellifont Abtei -- klösterliche Lebensdauer in 
Irland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abbaye de Mellifont -- la vie monastique en 
Irlande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abadia de Mellifont -- vida monastic em Ireland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbey di Mellifont -- vita monastic in Irlanda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αβαείο Mellifont -- μοναστική ζωή στην Ιρλανδία</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Detailed information about Mellifont Abbey, the first Cistercian monastery established in Ireland, plus ideas for a field trip and an extensive list of questions for students.</string>
            <string language="es">Información detallada sobre la Abadía Mellifont, el primer monasterio cisterciense establecido en Irlanda, junto con ideas para una visita al lugar y una amplia lista de preguntas para los estudiantes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas sonrach faoin Mhainistir Mhór, an chéad mhainistir Cistéirseach a bunaíodh in Éirinn, chomh maith le smaointe i gcomhair turas allamuigh agus liosta fada ceisteanna do dhaltaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausführliche Informationen über Mellifont Abtei,
den ersten Cistercian Monastery hergestellt in Irland, plus Ideen für
eine auffangenreise und eine umfangreiche Liste der Fragen für 
Kursteilnehmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Informations détaillées sur l'abbaye de 
Mellifont, la première monastère cistercienne établie en Irlande, 
plus des idées pour un voyage de zone et une liste étendue de 
questions pour des étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação detalhada sobre a abadia de 
Mellifont, o primeiro monastery de Cistercian estabelecido em Ireland,
mais idéias para um desengate de campo e uma lista extensiva das 
perguntas para estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni dettagliate sul abbey di 
Mellifont, sul primo monastery di Cistercian stabilito in Irlanda, 
più le idee per un viaggio di campo e una vasta lista delle domande 
per gli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλυτικές πληροφορίες για Mellifont το αβαείο, το 
πρώτο κιστερκιανό μοναστήρι που καθιερώνεται στην Ιρλανδία, συν 
τις ιδέες για ένα ταξίδι πεδίων και έναν εκτενή κατάλογο 
ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
